com.xatkit.plugins.giphy.platform

Class GiphyPlatform

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xatkit.core.platform.RuntimePlatform
      • com.xatkit.plugins.giphy.platform.GiphyPlatform

  • public class GiphyPlatform
extends RuntimePlatform
    A RuntimePlatform class that connects and interacts with the Giphy API.

    This platform provides the following RuntimeActions to interact with the Giphy API:

    • GetGif: retrieve a GIF from a given search query

    This class is part of xatkit's core platform, and can be used in an execution model by importing the GiphyPlatform package.

        public static String GIPHY_TOKEN_KEY

    • Constructor Detail

      • GiphyPlatform

        public GiphyPlatform(XatkitCore xatkitCore,
                     Configuration configuration)
        Constructs a new GiphyPlatform from the provided XatkitCore and Configuration.

        This constructor retrieves the Giphy API token from the provided configuration.

        Parameters:
        xatkitCore - the XatkitCore instance associated to this runtimePlatform
        configuration - the Configuration used to retrieve the Giphy API token
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the provided xatkitCore or configuration is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the provided Configuration does not contain a Giphy API token

        the Giphy API token
